properties.description: This blueprint stamps out new subscriptions for app teams with their resource groups and baseline infrastructure.  This includes policies on the resource groups.

metadata.description: Name prefix for public resources (i.e. storage accounts or key vaults)
The Azure UPN or email address of the user assigned to the Key Vault Access Policy.

services.description: Contains the supporting, shared Azure resources for the subscription.
services.name: services

network.description: Contains the network infrastructure and controls for the subscription.
network.name: network
